Title: Suburban Nation.
Subtitle: The Rise of Sprawl and the Decline of the American Dream.
Authors: Andres Duany;Elizabeth Plater-Zyberk;Jeff Speck.
Categories: Architecture.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=UZ0-0X4aiwQC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Three members of the Founders of the Congress for the New Urbanism give voice to a growing movement in North America to put an end to suburban sprawl and to replace the automobile-based settlement patterns of the past fifty years with a return to traditional planning principles.
